definition: a fundamental or central idea, to set the keynote of
details:
noun
- a fundamental or central idea
= example: a fundamental or central idea
- the first note of a diatonic musical scale
= example: the first note of a diatonic musical scale
= synonyms: tonic
- the principal theme in a speech or literary work
= example: the principal theme in a speech or literary work
verb
- to set the keynote of
= example: to set the keynote of
- to deliver the keynote address to an audience
= example: to deliver the keynote address to an audience
